ygData.subject: Armor

ygData.messageBody:
Me and My girlfriend play this on a good enough basis now, that I want to
get some better armor for her... I have decent stuff... for a lvl 18 war...
She is a lvl 17 Cleric high elf... and has a combo of Leather and Chain
mail.

I can normally get a group of about 4 to 5 people together between friends
and was wondering also if there was good quested armor or weapons that as a
group we could do?

everyone is close to 16 to 18... so if it's possible... could you give me
some hints maybe...

Thank you

Taine
18th Warrior
Protector of Scerene 17th Cleric
